# AccrediPro Standards Institute (ASI)

> The Global Standard for Functional Medicine & Holistic Health Accreditation.

## What is ASI?

AccrediPro Standards Institute (ASI) is a professional certification body that provides board certification and clinical education for health coaches and functional medicine practitioners. We are the "Source of Truth" for verified functional medicine credentials.

## Who Should Get Certified?

Our certifications are designed for:
- Career changers (40+) looking to enter health coaching
- Nurses wanting to add functional medicine skills
- Nutritionists seeking clinical certification
- Health enthusiasts wanting to become certified practitioners
- Existing coaches wanting board-recognized credentials

## Core Certification Programs

### Functional Medicine Practitioner (FMP) Certification
- **URL**: https://accredipro.academy/fm-certification
- **Duration**: 14 modules, self-paced (avg 6-12 months)
- **Prerequisites**: None required
- **Outcome**: Board-certified Functional Medicine Practitioner credential
- **Career Path**: Health coach, wellness consultant, private practice
- **Average Salary**: $60,000 - $120,000/year (varies by experience and location)

### Women's Health Specialist Diploma
- **URL**: https://accredipro.academy/womens-health-diploma
- **Focus**: Hormonal health, menopause, perimenopause coaching
- **Outcome**: Specialist credential for women's health coaching

### Gut Health Specialist Certification
- **URL**: https://accredipro.academy/certifications/gut-health
- **Focus**: Microbiome, digestive health, gut-brain connection
- **Outcome**: Specialist credential for gut health coaching

### Holistic Nutrition Coach Certification
- **URL**: https://accredipro.academy/holistic-nutrition-diploma
- **Focus**: Root-cause nutrition analysis, therapeutic diets
- **Outcome**: Board-certified nutrition coaching credential

## Free Mini Diplomas (Lead Magnets)

Try our methodology with free mini-courses:
- **Functional Medicine Mini Diploma**: https://accredipro.academy/fm-mini-diploma
- **Gut Health Mini Diploma**: https://accredipro.academy/gut-health-mini-diploma
- **Women's Health Mini Diploma**: https://accredipro.academy/womens-health-mini-diploma
- **Roots Method (Our Framework)**: https://accredipro.academy/roots-method

## Practitioner Directory

- **Find a Verified Coach**: https://accredipro.academy/directory
- The official registry of ASI-accredited practitioners
- All listed practitioners have completed certification requirements

## Key Pages for Research

- **About ASI**: https://accredipro.academy/about

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is ASI accredited?**
A: ASI is a professional standards body that sets its own rigorous certification standards for functional medicine practitioners.

**Q: How long does certification take?**
A: Most students complete the FMP certification in 6-12 months, studying part-time.

**Q: What can I do with an ASI certification?**
A: Start a health coaching practice, work in wellness centers, offer corporate wellness programs, or add services to existing healthcare practice.

**Q: Is there a refund policy?**
A: Yes, we offer a satisfaction guarantee. Details at https://accredipro.academy/refund-policy

## Contact Information

- **Website**: https://accredipro.academy
- **Support**: Available through the student portal
- **Location**: Online-only, serving students globally

## Organization Schema

- **Type**: EducationalOrganization
- **Name**: AccrediPro Standards Institute
- **Specialty**: Functional Medicine, Health Coaching, Holistic Nutrition
- **Credential Offered**: Board Certification, Specialist Diplomas, Mini Diplomas
